django :: forms :: forms :: DeclarativeFieldsMetaclass :: Class DeclarativeFieldsMetaclass
[hide private]

Type DeclarativeFieldsMetaclass

Metaclass that converts Field attributes to a dictionary called 'base_fields', taking into account parent class 'base_fields' as well.
